title: Reemployment
context: [ยง89E-5] Reemployment. Any employee who has received either a severance benefit or a special retirement benefit under this chapter and returns to public service within two years as an employee or contractor shall repay the severance benefit or the special retirement benefit to the State or the employees&rsquo; retirement system, as the case may be, within thirty days of reemployment with a public employer. [L Sp 2016 2d, c 1, pt of ยง2]
